archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Remove Party Payment Plan
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Remove a payment plan that may be one that represents a template that is no longer in use or a party specific plan that has been replaced before by another one.

properties.value: Remove Party Payment Plan removes a payment plan that may be one that represents a template that is no longer in use or a party specific plan that has been replaced before by another one. In the case of a replaced party payment plan the new plan is linked to the previous plan.
